channel.title: So sick of errors...im so confused lmao
channel.description:
i downloaded a client...its not mine, well i guess since i edited its mine. But thats not the topic point
[IMG]http://img122.imageshack.us/img122/6633/buttrm1.png[/img]
by the way, im useing that big compile thing thats the perfect compiler will all these commands, now when i press run it comes up with errors and i cant run the client. but when i click the run button, i can run the client untill it askes to log in, then i get an error saying it cant connect...
so what can i do to fix all those errors?

item.title: So sick of errors...im so confused lmao
item.dc:creator: @nozirev nozirev
item.description:
@nozirev wrote:

Here is the “Run” code BTW back up your old file (Just copy and paste the old one to your desktop incase this doesn’t work and you need to change back)

Here is the Run code below I have 2 so lets start with run then runserver

@echo off title Pkingkingz runserver "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_04/bin/javac.exe" *.java "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_04/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m server pause

(Note where it says pkingkingz you can change that to your server name)

@echo off color 0a title Project Czar java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Here is a compiler also:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Hope that helps.

Read full topic
item.source: So sick of errors...im so confused lmao
